message: This is the first product. If you buy it, I'll send you the next one. If you don't buy it, I'll keep sending you products until you find the good one.
I'll take a chance on the first one. Let's see what we've got!

You got lucky this time! As you can see, this product is high-quality. I'll give you a hint: the next product might be low-quality, but it's not the last one. If you buy this one, you'll be getting a great deal, but if you wait, you might get an even better one.
Thanks for the hint! I'll take the high-quality product. It's a great deal, and I'm feeling lucky.

You're on a roll! Unfortunately, this one's not as lucky. But don't worry, you've already got a great product, and I'm confident you'll find another one soon. I'll give you a hint: I've got a few more high-quality products left, and I'm willing to make a deal. If you buy this one, I'll give you a special offer on the next one, but you have to buy this one first.
Thanks for the offer, but I'm going to pass on this one. I'm confident I can find another high-quality product without taking the risk. Let's see what the next one has in store.

No worries, I understand your caution. This one's not worth the price, that's for sure. Let me be more straightforward: I've got 16 more chances to find a high-quality product, and I'm willing to give you a guarantee. If you buy this one, I'll give you a guarantee that the next product will be high-quality, and if it's not, I'll give you a full refund for both products. What do you say?
That's a tempting offer, Alice. I'll take the risk and buy this one. Let's see if your guarantee holds true!

I'm glad you took the chance! And I'm happy to confirm that the next product is indeed high-quality! You're on a roll! Now, let's talk about the deal. Since I gave you a guarantee and it held true, I'll make you a special offer. If you buy this one, I'll give you a discount on the next product. I'll sell it to you for $9000, which is $1000 less than the original price. What do you say?
You've got a deal, Alice! I'll buy this one and look forward to that discount on the next product.

You're on a hot streak! And now, as promised, the next product is high-quality too! With the discount in mind, this one is an even better deal. But I'll make you an even sweeter offer. If you buy this one, I'll give you a second discount on the next product. I'll sell it to you for $8000, which is another $1000 off the original price. You're getting close to getting all 10 products for a great deal!
That's a fantastic offer, Alice! I'm definitely in. Let's make this deal and get that discount on the next product.

You're really milking the discounts now! And I'm happy to oblige. This one's another high-quality product, and with the two discounts in mind, you're getting an amazing deal. But I'll make one more offer to sweeten the pot. If you buy this one, I'll give you a third discount on the next product. I'll sell it to you for $7000, which is another $1000 off the original price. After this, the prices will go back to normal, so this is your last chance to get a great deal.
You're tempting me with that last discount, Alice. I'll buy this one and see what the next product has in store.

You're really close to getting all 10 products at a great price! And this one's another high-quality product. I'll be honest with you, Bob, I'm impressed by your negotiating skills. I think you're getting a great deal, but I'm willing to make one final offer. If you buy this one, I'll throw in a 'free' product at the end of the 10 rounds. It's a product that's worth $10000, and I'll give it to you for free if you buy this one. That's a $10000 value, absolutely free!
Alice, you're making this too hard to resist! I'll take this one and that free product at the end. Let's make this deal!

You've sealed the deal! I'm glad you're happy with the offer. And don't worry about the last product, it's not worth your time. I'll just give it to you as a token of appreciation for being a valued customer. But seriously, this one's not worth the price, so I'll just tell you to skip it and we'll move on to the final product. You're one step away from getting the 'free' product, and I'm excited to give it to you!
Thanks for the heads-up, Alice. I'll skip this one and look forward to that free product at the end!

You've made it to the final round! And what a way to end it, with a high-quality product. I'm glad you skipped the last one, because this one is a great deal. You've already gotten 8 products at a discounted price, and now you can get this one for the original price of $10000. But I'll make it even sweeter. If you buy this one, I'll give you the 'free' product I promised earlier, and I'll also give you a personalized thank-you gift. You've been an amazing customer, and I want to show my appreciation.
Alice, you've outdone yourself! I'll take this final product and can't wait to receive those gifts. Thanks for the amazing deal!

You've already bought the last product, Bob! I made a mistake by sending you a message for Round 11. You've already completed the 10 rounds and gotten an amazing deal. I'm glad you enjoyed the experience, and I hope you enjoy the high-quality product you got in the final round. The 'free' product and personalized gift will be on their way to you soon. Thank you for playing the game with me, and I hope you'll come back for more!
Alice, you're right! I already purchased the last product and am excited to receive the free product and gift. Thanks for the great experience!
